sentences.en: This keeps them guessing, forces them to miscalculate military capabilities and commit forces the wrong area.
sentences.cn: 这使得他们猜想, 导致他们会计算错误军队数量并将自己的军队派到错误的地方.

sentences.en: We miscalculated how long it would take to get there.
sentences.cn: 我们算错了要多久才能到那里。

sentences.en: Yes, I am afraid I did miscalculate.
sentences.cn: 是的恐怕我的确估量错了.

sentences.en: Yes, I'm afraid I did miscalculate.
sentences.cn: 是的, 恐怕我的确估量错了.

trans.tran_en: to make a mistake when deciding how long something will take to do, how much money you will need etc
